summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; accepting and appropriating a donation from the Advisory Council for Specialized Programs for physical education purposes in support of the City's Special Services Program, (Specialized Day Camp Program), increasing the budget allowance for object of expenditure "Temporary and Intermittent Employment" in the Program Category "Special Services" in the 1974 Budget of said Department, and authorizing certain temporary and/or part time employment in connection therewith.
